Fitch's Bridge Estates

Parking

Fitch's Bridge, Pepperell Road, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Hours

Half an hour past sunrise to half an hour past sunset. Sunrise Time , Sunset Time

Size

0.9 Acres, Trails 0.2 miles, 0.3 km

Property Owner

Groton Conservation Commission

Links

Groton Herald, Fitch's Bridge

Trail Maintenance

Volunteers and the Groton Trails Committee. Please email trails@townofgroton.org to report problems or volunteer.

Description

This property is part of the trail network that follows the abandoned Brookline and Pepperell railroad. The trail network connects the Squannacook River to Fitch's Bridge. Parking is available at Fitch's Bridge off of Pepperell Road.

Map

Click/Press map for detailed view.

Please send us your photos of the Fitch's Bridge Estates!
